TopicTitle: How can I start in space?

Articles.Content:
Im trying to pratice docking with one of my ships. Its huge, and takes about 5 minutes to get out of the atmosphere. I want to just start in space, so when I mess up I dont have to relaunch my rocket everytime. Can this be done, are there any mods?

Edited June 8, 2015 by Gonzxor
HyperEdit is the mod you're looking for, the "Orbit Editor" function can teleport you from the pad to the orbit of your choice around the body of your choice.
Or alternately, you can launch a ship once, then quicksave in orbit and quickload back to orbit each time you screw up.
if you don't want to cheat, you can also quicksave by pressing F5 and load the last quicksave by holding down F9, so you don't have to relaunch if you mess up.

You know very well that, for distances as small as Kerbin orbit, Quicksave is almost as much a cheat as Hyper Edit.

Which for training purposes doesnt matter anyways.
You can have more than one quicksave with Mod+F5/F9.
